comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A William Watts Sherman died in 1912. His NYT obituary is query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F40B1EFF3C5813738... His widow (second wife) was the former Sophia Augusta Brown, daughter of John Carter Brown, founder of Brown University. The obituary does not mention a son with the same name. www.iment.com/maida/friends/eileen/index.htm has a picture of Mrs William Watts Sherman that looks to be the same person, with a clipping that mentions her "wonderful collection of pearls and diamonds."

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Swanq: I agree that  the portrait of Mrs. W. W. Sherman in the above website does look like the woman in the Bain photo.  We will add her full name to the description when we update.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry on her husband: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Watts_Sherman
